gizmos.title: Gizmo
gizmos.intro: is an open-source project that brings together a wide range of essential tools for developers, all in one place. Whether you’re working on web, mobile, or desktop projects, Devgizmos helps you boost your productivity and streamline your workflow.
gizmos.gizmoTerm: The term “gizmo” refers to a gadget, especially one whose real name is unknown or forgotten. In Turkish, it’s also called zamazingo, zımbırtı, or dalgametre.
gizmos.offlineTitle: Devgizmos is fully offline-first and privacy-focused.
gizmos.offlineDesc: All tools run entirely in your browser, so your data never leaves your device. This makes Devgizmos more secure than most alternatives and ideal for sensitive or private work.
gizmos.openSourceTitle: The project is constantly updated and open source.
gizmos.openSourceDesc: Anyone can contribute or suggest new features. Thanks to its open nature, Devgizmos evolves with the needs of the developer community.
gizmos.noAds: You will never see ads here.
gizmos.support: If you’d like to support the project and help cover domain and Cloudflare costs, you can buy us a coffee ☕.
gizmos.supportDesc: * Browser restrictions such as CORS require some gizmos to run on a server. These gizmos include privacy warnings. Since we do not have a large community yet, we have no sponsors. All costs for gizmos running on Cloudflare Workers are covered personally.
gizmos.roadmapDesc: We are continuously adding new gizmos and improving existing ones based on user feedback. You can follow the progress and contribute on our GitHub page.

items.title: Diff Checker
items.description: Compare two pieces of code or text to identify differences with visual highlighting. Perfect for code reviews, file comparisons, version control analysis, and spotting changes between text documents. Works with any programming language including JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, JSON, and plain text files.

items.title: String Builder
items.description: Generate C# StringBuilder code automatically with proper string escaping. Convert multiline text, quotes, and special characters into valid StringBuilder.Append() statements. Essential tool for C# developers working with dynamic string construction, SQL query builders, and text processing applications.

items.title: Case Converter
items.description: Convert text between different case formats including camelCase, PascalCase, snake_case, kebab-case, UPPERCASE, lowercase, and Title Case. Perfect for developers working with variable names, API endpoints, database columns, CSS classes, and file naming conventions across different programming languages.

items.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
items.description: Generate Lorem Ipsum placeholder text for web design, graphic design, and content layouts. Create custom amounts of words, sentences, or paragraphs of dummy text. Essential for mockups, prototypes, website templates, and testing text layouts without getting distracted by content.

items.title: Fake E-mail Address Generator
items.description: Generate realistic fake email addresses for testing, development, and demonstration purposes. Create random email addresses with various domains and formats. Perfect for populating databases, testing registration forms, email validation systems, and creating sample data for applications without using real email addresses.

items.title: URL Parser
items.description: Parse and analyze URLs to extract components like protocol, hostname, path, query parameters, fragments, and port numbers. Essential for web developers, API testing, SEO analysis, and understanding URL structure for routing, redirects, and link building.

items.title: Slug Generator
items.description: Convert text into SEO-friendly URL slugs with automatic character conversion for international languages. Handles Turkish, German, French, Spanish, and other special characters. Perfect for creating clean URLs, blog post slugs, product pages, and improving website SEO structure.

items.title: Text Deduplicator
items.description: Remove duplicate lines and words from text with advanced filtering options. Configure case sensitivity, choose between line or word deduplication, and select output formats. Ideal for cleaning data lists, removing duplicate entries from CSV files, and text preprocessing tasks.

items.title: Text Sorter & Reverser
items.description: Sort text lines alphabetically, numerically, or in reverse order with advanced options for case sensitivity, natural sorting, and custom delimiters. Remove duplicates, shuffle lines, and clean up text data. Perfect for organizing lists, processing CSV data, preparing datasets, and text preprocessing tasks.

items.title: ASCII - Unicode Converter
items.description: Convert text to ASCII or Unicode character codes and vice versa. Decode character representations, handle international characters, and work with different text encodings. Essential for debugging text processing, character analysis, escape sequence handling, and understanding character encoding issues across different systems.

items.title: Guid Generator
items.description: Generate RFC 4122 compliant version 4 GUIDs (Globally Unique Identifiers) instantly. Create multiple unique identifiers for database primary keys, API tokens, session IDs, and object identification. Essential for developers working with distributed systems, databases, and unique identifier requirements.

items.title: Password Generator
items.description: Create cryptographically secure passwords with customizable length and character sets including uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special symbols. Generate strong passwords for accounts, applications, and security systems. Includes password strength assessment and entropy calculation.

items.title: MD5 Hash Generator
items.description: Generate MD5 hash values for text and files. Useful for file integrity checking, password hashing (for legacy systems), data verification, and simple checksum operations. Note: For security-critical applications, SHA-256 or stronger hash algorithms should be preferred over MD5.

items.title: SHA Hash Generator
items.description: Generate secure cryptographic hash values using SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512, and other SHA variants. Essential for security applications, digital signatures, password hashing, file integrity verification, and data validation. Provides modern and secure hash algorithms for production use.

items.title: Checksum Calculator
items.description: Calculate and verify file integrity using CRC32, Adler-32, MD5, SHA1, SHA256, and SHA512 checksum algorithms. Essential for verifying file downloads, detecting data corruption, ensuring file authenticity, and implementing security protocols. Supports both text input and file processing.

items.title: JSON Beautifier
items.description: Format and beautify JSON data with proper indentation and syntax highlighting. Convert minified JSON into readable, well-structured format. Essential for debugging APIs, analyzing configuration files, and making JSON data human-readable. Supports validation and error detection for malformed JSON.

items.title: JSON Minifier
items.description: Compress JSON files by removing unnecessary whitespace, line breaks, and comments. Reduce file size for faster loading, API responses, and storage optimization. Perfect for production deployments, CDN optimization, and minimizing bandwidth usage while maintaining data integrity.

items.title: MongoDB JSON Converter
items.description: Convert MongoDB JSON format (ObjectId, ISODate, NumberInt, etc.) to standard JSON format.

items.title: HTML Beautifier
items.description: Format and indent HTML code for better readability and maintainability. Clean up messy HTML, add proper indentation, and organize nested elements. Essential for code reviews, debugging web pages, and improving HTML code quality. Works with HTML5, XHTML, and embedded CSS/JavaScript.

items.title: HTML Minifier
items.description: Minify your HTML codes.

items.title: SQL Beautifier
items.description: Format SQL queries with proper indentation, keyword highlighting, and readable structure. Supports MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, and Oracle syntax. Perfect for debugging complex queries, improving code readability, and maintaining database scripts. Handles joins, subqueries, and advanced SQL features.

items.title: E-Invoice UBL Viewer
items.description: Display E-Invoice XML (UBL) files in HTML format. Supports embedded XSLT styles.

items.title: Base64
items.description: Encode text, files, and binary data to Base64 format or decode Base64 strings back to original content. Essential for data transmission, email attachments, embedding images in HTML/CSS, API authentication tokens, and handling binary data in JSON. Supports file uploads and drag-and-drop functionality.

items.title: URL Encoder / Decoder
items.description: Encode and decode URL strings with proper percent-encoding for special characters, spaces, and international characters. Essential for web development, API requests, form submissions, and ensuring URLs are properly formatted for browsers and servers. Handles UTF-8 encoding and decoding seamlessly.

items.title: JWT Decoder
items.description: Paste a JWT (JSON Web Token) to decode its header and payload. Signature is not verified. No data is sent to a server; decoding is done locally in your browser.

items.title: My IP Address
items.description: Discover your public IP address, geolocation information, ISP details, and network characteristics. Essential for network troubleshooting, security analysis, remote access configuration, and understanding your internet connection. Shows both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses when available.

items.title: CIDR Calculator
items.description: You can use the CIDR Calculator Gizmo to analyze your given IP address in CIDR notation and easily calculate details such as network address, broadcast address, first and last usable IP, subnet mask, and total host count.

items.title: UTM Link Generator
items.description: Create campaign tracking links with UTM parameters for Google Analytics and marketing attribution. Track campaign source, medium, campaign name, content, and terms across different marketing channels including email, social media, ads, and referral links. Essential for marketing ROI analysis and traffic source identification.

items.title: Open Graph & X Card Preview
items.description: Preview and generate Open Graph meta tags for Facebook, Twitter/X Cards, LinkedIn, and other social media platforms. Optimize social media sharing with custom titles, descriptions, images, and metadata. Essential for social media marketing, content optimization, and ensuring proper link previews across all social platforms.

items.title: Regex Tester
items.description: Enter a JavaScript regular expression and test it against a target string. Flags and multiline patterns are supported. Named groups will be shown if present.

items.title: UUID/GUID Validator
items.description: Validate and verify UUID/GUID format compliance across all versions (v1, v3, v4, v5). Check syntax correctness, identify UUID version and variant, and ensure proper formatting for database keys, API identifiers, and distributed system components. Essential for data validation and system integration.

items.title: JSON Validator
items.description: Validate JSON syntax, detect formatting errors, and analyze structure with detailed error reporting. Essential for API development, configuration file validation, data interchange verification, and ensuring JSON compliance. Shows line numbers for errors and provides suggestions for common JSON syntax issues.

items.title: Unix Timestamp Converter
items.description: Convert between Unix timestamps (epoch time) and human-readable dates with timezone support. Handle millisecond precision, UTC and local time conversions, and various date formats. Essential for log analysis, database operations, API development, and working with time-based data across different systems and programming languages.

items.title: File Size Converter
items.description: Convert between different file size units including bytes, kilobytes, megabytes, gigabytes, terabytes, and petabytes. Supports both binary (1024) and decimal (1000) calculations. Perfect for storage planning, bandwidth calculations, file management, and understanding data transfer requirements across different systems.

items.title: Roman Numeral Converter
items.description: Convert between Arabic numbers and Roman numerals with support for numbers 1-3999. Includes validation for proper Roman numeral format and historical accuracy. Perfect for educational purposes, document formatting, numbered lists, movie sequels, book chapters, and historical or formal documentation requirements.

items.title: QR Code Generator
items.description: Create customizable QR codes for various content types and download in SVG/PNG formats.

items.title: Color Palette Generator
items.description: Create beautiful color palettes using various color theories and check color contrasts.

items.title: Color Contrast Checker
items.description: Check color contrasts according to WCAG standards and verify accessibility compliance.

jwt.privacyNote: No data is sent to a server; decoding is done locally in your browser.
jwt.invalidParts: Invalid JWT: Must have three parts separated by dots.
jwt.invalidHeaderJson: Invalid JWT: Header is not valid JSON.
jwt.invalidPayloadJson: Invalid JWT: Payload is not valid JSON.

ogCardPreview.privacyNotice: Privacy Notice: This Gizmo uses a proxy running on Cloudflare Workers to bypass CORS restrictions. Your IP address is temporarily stored to enforce rate limit rules.
ogCardPreview.noTags: No meta tags to preview yet.
ogCardPreview.noMetaFound: No Open Graph, X Card or structured data meta tags found.
ogCardPreview.warningEmptyOg: The following Open Graph tags are present but empty:
ogCardPreview.warningMissingOg: The following required Open Graph tags are missing:
ogCardPreview.infoEmptyOg: The following optional Open Graph tags are present but empty:
ogCardPreview.infoEmptyOgNote: These tags are not required, but filling them can improve your card's appearance.
ogCardPreview.warningEmptyTwitter: The following Twitter Card tags are present but empty:
ogCardPreview.warningMissingTwitter: The following required Twitter Card tags are missing:
ogCardPreview.infoEmptyTwitter: The following optional Twitter Card tags are present but empty:
ogCardPreview.infoEmptyTwitterNote: These tags are not required, but filling them can improve your card's appearance on X (Twitter).
ogCardPreview.errorNoMeta: No Open Graph, X Card or structured data meta tags found.

utmLinkGenerator.campaignNamePlaceholder: Product, promo code, or slogan (e.g. spring_sale)
utmLinkGenerator.errorSourceRequired: Campaign Source parameter cannot be empty.
utmLinkGenerator.errorMediumRequired: Campaign Medium parameter cannot be empty.
utmLinkGenerator.errorNameRequired: Campaign Name parameter cannot be empty.

cidrCalculator.inputPlaceholder: Enter IP address in CIDR notation (e.g. 192.168.1.0/24)

myIpAddress.privacyNotice: This Gizmo uses Cloudflare Workers to retrieve information about your IP address.

einvoice_viewer.title: E-Invoice Viewer
einvoice_viewer.description: Display E-Invoice XML files in HTML format

unix_timestamp.title: Unix Timestamp Converter
unix_timestamp.description: Convert between Unix timestamps and human-readable dates
unix_timestamp.unix_description: Unix timestamp is the number of seconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

file_size_converter.title: File Size Converter
file_size_converter.description: Convert file sizes between different units
file_size_converter.note_description: Binary system (base 1024) is typically used by operating systems, while decimal system (base 1000) is used by file manufacturers.

roman_numeral.title: Roman Numeral Converter
roman_numeral.description: Convert between decimal numbers and Roman numerals
roman_numeral.valid_characters: Valid characters: I, V, X, L, C, D, M
roman_numeral.rule_1: Symbols are written from left to right in decreasing order
roman_numeral.rule_2: Smaller symbols before larger ones indicate subtraction
roman_numeral.rule_3: Only I, X, and C can be used for subtraction
roman_numeral.rule_4: Same symbol can be repeated at most 3 times consecutively

qr_code_generator.title: QR Code Generator
qr_code_generator.description: Create customizable QR codes for various content types and download in SVG/PNG formats
qr_code_generator.text_placeholder: Enter the text you want to convert to QR code...
qr_code_generator.enter_content: Enter content to generate QR code
qr_code_generator.vcard_photo_help: JPEG/PNG format, max 5KB (32x32 pixel) for iOS compatibility
qr_code_generator.photo_limitation_desc: QR codes have very limited data capacity. Use very small and simple images or prefer vCard without photo.
qr_code_generator.photo_tip_1: Solid color, simple logos work best

color_palette_generator.title: Color Palette Generator
color_palette_generator.description: Create beautiful color palettes using various color theories and check color contrasts
color_palette_generator.website_content: This is sample content. You can see how your color palette looks on a website here.

color_contrast_checker.title: Color Contrast Checker
color_contrast_checker.description: Check color contrasts according to WCAG standards and verify accessibility compliance
color_contrast_checker.sample_text: This is sample text showing how your main content would appear.
color_contrast_checker.sample_small_text: This shows how small font text would look.
